page.title: 16SOUTHGATE COUNTY CLUB.
page.content: FOUNDED IN 1928 AS A SOCIAL AMENITY THIS PRIVATE CLUB NOW HAS A TOTAL MEMBERSHIP OF 520. THE BUILDING HAS TWO WELL FURNISHED BARS. THE LOUNGE BAR HAS A PIANO AND SMALL DANCE FLOOR, THE OTHER HAS A TELEVISION SET, POOL TABLE AND DART BOARD. THE ATMOSPHERE IS WARM AND FRIENDLY, AND IT IS A GOOD SOCIAL CENTRE FOR THE COMMUNITY. THE DARTS AND POOLS COMPETE IN LOCAL COMPETITIONS BRIDGE AFTERNOONS AND WHIST EVENINGS ARE HELD REGULARLY. THE CLUB IS ALSO THE HEADQUATERS OF SOUTHGATE COUNTY FOOTBALL CLUB. OCCASIOUAL ENTERTAINMENT IS PROVIDED BY PROFESSIONAL PERFORMERS, CHOIRS AND DISCOS, WHILE MEMBERS ARE ALLOWED TO HOLD PRIVATE FUNCTIONS. BINGO SESSIONS ARE HELD ON SATURDAY EVENINGS, AND AN ANNUAL CHRISTMAS PARTY IS GIVEN FOR CHILDREN AND GRANDCHILDREN OF MEMBERS.
